rules_text:
Moxie [i](You may have this enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. If you don't, get {E}{E}.)[/i]
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {E}. If you do, exile a number of cards from the top of your library equal to Magmatic Assembly's power. An opponent chooses one. Put the chosen card on the bottom of your library. You may play the others this turn.
